thread.title: A wonderful weekend in Parrr
thread.title_full: A wonderful weekend in Parrr - Review of First Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Harry T
title: A wonderful weekend in Parrr
text:
My girlfriend and I have fell in love with the city and the area surrounding the hotel.
The hotel is located right next to the metro which is ideal for travelling around the city. From our room you could see the Eiffel Tower (looked incredible at night). There is the BEST bakery next door and a park opposite where you can enjoy a croissant and coffee in the morning.
The hotel rooms were clean, stylish and comfortable.
I would 100% stay here again. A special shout out to Maonna - a staff member who was incredibly cheery and made our stay extra special.
